title: Not getting my cat ward
body: I spent 130 tokens on getting the pumpkin cat ward skin and i'm not getting it. I have played a few games and relogged and still don't have it. Anyone one else with this issue?

replies.body: I even tried to get it twice, still no ward and 300 tokens lost.
I got it from capsule and it just disappear, damn it{{summoner:35}}
Same problem
Same bought it with tokens still dont have it.
Just bought it myself and it's still not showing up. So, this is days later after this post and there's still an issue with it. Sent in a ticket. Did anyone have any luck after sending a ticket in?
I bought it today and nope. Cat no found. :(   {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Yeah same problem here, I bought the ward with 150 tokens, I see it in my loot page, and its there under wards and it says ''Owned'' but it doesnt go to my collection and actually Unlocked it, i tried relogging and playing a couple of games but nothing :(
We're in the same boat.It's one of the reasons why I bought Bewitching Janna bundle but I didn't get it q.q
I haven't gotten it either D:

I had bought the Bewitching Janna bundle was also suppose to get the kitty ward and seems I have not received it. :( 

~KittySuppSquad {{sticker:sona-playing}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
This has been a common bug for like, months now. You simply reboot the client and everything is where it should be.
meanwhile I bought it twice , and still can't see it , the second one went to my loot to disenchant it , but the first one still can't take it
Same issue. I want my spoopy cat :c

I'm having the same problem. The ward is nowhere to be found in collection or champ select page. I purchased it with tokens and it says "Owned" but where is it?! I thought it's a pumpkin cat not a ghost cat! {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
It's got stray

I unlocked it before buying one of the halloween bundles than I noticed the ward wasn't showing up so I tried unlocking it again a few times... It kept taking my tokens and didn't show up even after I relogged, though eventually I could select the ward in champ select.
I didn't get the ward too ;D
Same. I bought the cat icon and the ward but only got the icon.

> Not getting my cat ward

I seek the Eternal Catnip, shrouded in mystery, its legend traveling through the alcoholic fumes of hushed whispers in disreputable taverns. I shall travel catward, toward the Great Meow. There, I shall find my salvation... or my doom.

I bought this ward twice and spent 300 tokens. In second time I got the permanent ward skin shard in my loot inventory {{item:3348}}W{{item:3348}}
There is no ward in my collection. But I can use this skin in game. Sent a bug report and ticket, I hope they'll refund my 150 tokens.

I'm not getting it, either. I had bought it with tokens, then bought the Ekko bundle, and still don't have it. It says I own it in the bundle, but doesn't in the World's Token crafting menu. I even checked my collection of wards to see what wards I do and don't have, but it doesn't show up there, either. Even though it should show as unowned if it's acting like I don't have it.
I bought it too and it's not showing either. :c

I'm having the same issue.
Bought a Spooky Marksman Orb and the cat ward.
The orb worked fine but I didn't get the ward.
nope, send a ticket?
Yeah same here it says owned in the shop but I can't use it in game. But Idk riot is just a small  Indie game that can't handle the massive flow of users lmao
